Class.name: ITB.HL7.Format.HL7XMLv2
Class.Description:
Format HL7 from ER7 to XML and viceversa

LookUp tables with mappings from Ensemble XML groups to HL7 XML group names are REQUIRED to generate valid HL7 XML files See ITK.HL7.Util.XSDParser

Use ITB.HL7.Util.Convert to convert HL7 messages.

Based on EnsLib.ITK.HL7.FormatXMLv2 by Rajiv Bhatia

Changes:
  • 2018-11-08, duquesno: Remove $ZSTRIP(,"*C") from XML elements, to keep LineFeeds (allow $c(10) to reach XMLEscape() function)

Method.Description: ITB. to xml. Custom Escape method for HL7-XML. Based on EnsLib.HL7.Segment.
Method.Implementation: Set tEscape=$g(pEscapeChar,$$$ESCSEP(pSeparators)) Set replace($C(10))=tEscape_"X0A"_tEscape Set replace($C(13))=tEscape_"X0D"_tEscape Set replace($$$FSSEP(pSeparators))=tEscape_"F"_tEscape Set replace($$$RSSEP(pSeparators))=tEscape_"R"_tEscape Set replace($$$CSSEP(pSeparators))=tEscape_"S"_tEscape Set replace($$$SSSEP(pSeparators))=tEscape_"T"_tEscape //Set replace($$$ESCSEP(pSeparators))=tEscape_"E"_tEscape Quit $$replaceArray^EnsUtil(pData,.replace)

Method.Description: ITB. to xml. Custom Unescape method for HL7-XML. Based on EnsLib.HL7.Segment.
Method.Implementation: Set tEscape=$g(pEscapeChar,$$$ESCSEP(pSeparators)) Set replace(tEscape_"X0A"_tEscape)=$c(10) Set replace(tEscape_"X0D"_tEscape)=$c(13) //Set replace(tEscape_".br"_tEscape)=$C(13) Set replace(tEscape_"F"_tEscape)=$$$FSSEP(pSeparators) Set replace(tEscape_"R"_tEscape)=$$$RSSEP(pSeparators) Set replace(tEscape_"S"_tEscape)=$$$CSSEP(pSeparators) Set replace(tEscape_"T"_tEscape)=$$$SSSEP(pSeparators) Set replace(tEscape_"E"_tEscape)=$$$ESCSEP(pSeparators) Quit $$replaceArrayLeftToRight^EnsUtil(pData,.replace,5,.pLastPos)
